name: Hydration & Beyond Super-Size Water Drench Cream and Bonus Hydra-Gel Eye Patches
about: What it is:A limited-edition kit featuring a super-size Water Drench cream and three pairs of Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches for extra hydration..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Puffiness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Is a potent hydrator that drenches skin with moisture and draws in water..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:The Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream Hydrating Moisturizer drenches skin with a 30 percent hyaluronic acid complex while providing up to 72 hours of hydration with Pentavitin. The Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches hydrate and visibly minimize under-eye puffiness with hyaluronic acid, collagen, and caffeine..This Set Contains:- 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream Hydrating Moisturizer.Clinical Results:In a 28-day study applying a 1% Pentavitin formulation:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Is a potent hydrator that drenches skin with moisture and draws in water..-Pentavitin: Hydrates for up to 72 hours, even after cleansing..-Ceramides: Moisturize, leaving skin feeling silky soft and smooth...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream Hydrating Moisturizer:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dipropylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Cyclohexasiloxane, Yeast Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide EOS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NS, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Silk, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Caprooyl Phytosphingosine, Caprooyl Sphingosine, Saccharide Isomerate, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Silicon Ferment, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Methyl Gluceth-20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Cholesterol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Behenic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Ceteareth-25, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Mica...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Glucomannan, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glucose, Althaea Officinalis Leaf Extract, Calcium Chloride, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Cimicifuga Racemosa Root Extract, Polygonum Multiflorum Root Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Phellinus Linteus Extract, Angelica Gigas Root Extract, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Propanediol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Xylitylglucoside, Sucrose, Anhydroxylitol, Disodium EDTA, 1,2-Hexanediol, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Gellan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xylitol, Betaine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Copper Gluconate, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Norbornanediamine/Resorcinol Diglycidyl Ether Crosspolymer, Tin Oxide, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mica/CI 77019, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891, FD&C Blue No. 1/CI 42090, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream Hydrating Moisturizer:.-Apply twice daily to your face and neck..-For external use only...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.-Gently lift and separate a delicate gel patch..-Apply to a clean, dry under-eye area..-Repeat on other side..-Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes..-Discard after use and gently pat remaining serum into skin..-For external use only.
